DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that the BONFILS is beneficial for intubation of manikins while performing CPR. In the current study we compared the performance of the BONFILS and the Macintosh laryngoscopes with respect to their effectiveness and time to successful ETI during chest compression (CC) using an adult manikin.
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study minimum 1 year of work experience in emergency medicine experienced emergency medical personnel (paramedics, nurses, physicians) not meet the above criteria wrist or low back diseases
